full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'JIGS MED DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA HO THO THU BLO BZANG 'JIGS MED RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SPRUL SKUR MTSAN GSOL THOG MTSAN BSTOD DANG 'BREL BA'I ZHABS BRTAN MDZAD 'PHRIN RGYAS PA'I SMON TSIG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES DGA' LDAN DGE RGYAS GLING GI MKHAN SPRUL SKAL BZANG YE @004B SHES RAB RGYAS, DZA SAG BLA MA DKON MCHOG SKYABS, ,KHRE GZHUNG PA LAS DGE 'DUN BLO GROS, ,GSOL DPON DKON MCHOG BKRA SHIS, ,MGRON GNYER BLO BZANG CHOS SBYOR SOGS BLA GRVA THUN MONG NAS BSKUL NGOR, ^ SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN CHOS KYI GRAGS PA BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG DPAL BZANG POS GZIMS CHUNG BKA' GDAMS PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN CHOS KYI GRAGS PA BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG
